raw_body: OMI. Who was living out his retirement at Marian grove in Kohuwala, was summoned to everlasting rest on 13th November 2023 at the age of 79. His mortal remains will be brought to De Mazenod House, Colombo 15, on 14th November 2023 at 6.00 a.m. There will be a special mass presided over by Fr. Provincial at De Mazenod House at 6.30 a.m. Fr. Felician’s Mortal remains will b
